main

Class UnDupeKeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.UnDupeKeeper

  • public class UnDupeKeeper
extends java.lang.Object
    UnDupeKeeper is the main class. It calls and starts everything on the system, regarding to User Interface, and working threads. Also takes care about settings.
    Author:
    vliopard

      private static java.nio.file.Path checkPromptArguments(java.lang.String[] arguments)
      This method validates arguments passed to UnDupeKeeper via command prompt.
      private static void createAndShowGUI()
      This method creates and display the Graphical User Interface, putting an Icon on System Tray and its pop-up menu.
      private static void err(java.lang.String errorMessage)
      This method displays an error message through the embedded log system.

      private static void showAbout()
      This method creates and display an About dialog containing some information about the UnDupeKeeper.
      private static void startShutdown()
      This is the method that starts the shutdown process and inform all the working threads they must have to exit.
      private static void startUI()
      This is a method for starting the user interface.
      private static void usage()
      In case of UnDupeKeeper is called by command prompt this method will show an usage message after receiving wrong parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • usage

        private static void usage()
        In case of UnDupeKeeper is called by command prompt this method will show an usage message after receiving wrong parameters.

      • isDir

        private static boolean isDir(java.nio.file.Path dirName)
        This method checks if a path is really a directory.
        Parameters:
        dirName - A Path to a file location.
        Returns:
        Return false when dirName is: null, not exists and is a Directory. Return true if it is an actual file.

      • checkPromptArguments

        private static java.nio.file.Path checkPromptArguments(java.lang.String[] arguments)
        This method validates arguments passed to UnDupeKeeper via command prompt.
        Parameters:
        arguments - A String array containing the command prompt arguments.
        Returns:
        Returns a Path containing the directory passed as argument. Sets recursive mode 'on'.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is the main method of UnDupeKeeper that starts all the system.
        Parameters:
        args - A String array from command prompt that contains arguments or empty.

      • startShutdown

        private static void startShutdown()
        This is the method that starts the shutdown process and inform all the working threads they must have to exit.

      • startUI

        private static void startUI()
        This is a method for starting the user interface. It puts a System Tray Icon, sets the Look and Feel and other many options.

      • showAbout

        private static void showAbout()
        This method creates and display an About dialog containing some information about the UnDupeKeeper.

      • createAndShowGUI

        private static void createAndShowGUI()
        This method creates and display the Graphical User Interface, putting an Icon on System Tray and its pop-up menu.

      • msg

        private static void msg(java.lang.String message)
        This method displays a message through the embedded log system.
        Parameters:
        message - A String containing the message to display.

      • err

        private static void err(java.lang.String errorMessage)
        This method displays an error message through the embedded log system.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - A String containing the error message to display.
